body_content.explanation: (of buildings, gardens, etc.) designed in a traditional Italian style:
examples: The Italianate facade will be retained as part of any future development.
At the back lies an Italianate garden, complete with palisade and classical statues in bronze.

body_content.explanation: typical of, or found in, Italy:
examples: I have had schnitzel before, and have had difficulty separating the German variety from its Italianate cousin, veal milanese.
Their clothes are branded with Italianate names such as Armando, Zantos and Louis Gianni.
